Approved by project lead to defer to 4.3 per July 31 Platform meeting discussion

mass update:
retarget from 4.3 to 4.4. Cannot be contained in 4.3 due to resource limtation.
This is more like a feature (as we know that XPath spec not completely supported by FastXPath) and I think it is low priority because we don't exercise that function yet in our scenarios.
